name: Asterisk
long_description:
Asterisk is an AI Hacker for Codebases. It automatically finds, verifies, and patches security vulnerabilities in your codebase, enabling continuous security checks without slowing down your development process.

Asterisk can find business logic errors with context-aware scanning and automate the full auditing cycle to generate reports with near-zero false positives.
one_liner: AI-augmented security audits for modern development teams.
